resources.string:
This is a very useful app to export and import vCard files. It allows export/import of both single as well as multiple contacts vCard files and supports vCard versions 2.1, 3,0 and 4.0.
It also supports a CSV format for import/export giving you the flexibility to modify the contacts files in tools like Google Sheet,Microsoft Excel, etc.
Apart from this you can also Add/Edit contacts, make calls, send message and search for contacts.
